title: IP Boost Not Working?
body: Hello, I verified my email yesterday but I didn't get an IP boost?

replies.body: I went ahead and double checked for you, and it looks like you did get that IP boost for email verification, and it currently has 1 win left on it.
Oh! Sorry, I guess I'm just used to the old client where it displayed the IP boosts next to your IP count. Where is it located now?
